thread.title: Shital Shah: 10 things you should know about Shital Shah - Times of India
thread.title_full: Shital Shah: 10 things you should know about Shital Shah - Times of India

author: Ano Patel
title: Shital Shah: 10 things you should know about Shital Shah - Times of India
text:
1. The actress a number of TV shows to her credit like Kahani Chandrakanta Ki and Har Yug Mein Aayega Ek ��� Arjun .
2. The actress has been a part of a number of Bollywood movies including My Friend Ganesha , Kram and The Flag .
3. The actress has been actively involved in theatre and has done a number of plays, with more than 150 shows of the play shaadi@barbaadi.com .
4. The talented Ahmedabad-based actress has also done plays with veteran actor Paresh Rawal, who she considers as her mentor.
5. She has worked with directors Sanjay Leela Bhansali and Neeraj Pandey and wishes to work with Rajkumar Hirani and Aamir Khan in one of their projects. Shital has also always admired the work of Hrishikesh Mukherjee and regrets the fact that she is a generation late to have had a chance to work with him.
6. While acting was always on the cards for Shital, she also has an MBA degree.
7. She works alongwith her chartered accontant sister (Shaina Shah) and mother (Hina Shah, founder-director) at International Centre for Entrepreneurship & Career Development (ICECD).
8. Shital is also a painter. She paints alongwith her mother and sister under the brand name Different Strokes with their works exhibited at their art house in Ahmedabad.
9.The three of them also perform Odissi and national and international dance festivals and hold dance recitals. She began learning Odissi from her mother at the age of three.
10. The trio is now making a Gujarati film - Hu Tu Tu Tu - together, where Hina Shah is the producer, Shaina Shah is the creative director and Shital Shah is the director, scriptwriter, screenplay writer and actor.
